2024-11-26 00:00:00.text:
*Nov 25*
• Reworked on the Lab Module UI after identifying that collected samples can only be tracked using a barcode scan or barcode number. Updated the Lab Technician’s UI flow accordingly.
• Had a brief discussion with Bodhi and Gigin about the Lab Module progress during a quick call.
• Reviewed Vivek’s designs for the new Shift Patient and Patient Notes pages and provided detailed feedback.
*Next*
• Finalise the Lab Module UI draft and share the updated version.
